materials_name: albumen (egg white protein) albumen paper paper (fiber product)
physical_appearance: This is a oval-shaped portrait of a woman. She is sitting kneeled on the floor, with her hands on her lap. There is a cylindrical object in front of her, on the left of the photo. She has excess hair growth especially on her face. The title is written at the bottom, below the photograph.
title_text: Photograph album of views and portraits in the Punjab, Cashmere, Ceylon, Burma, Penang, Singapore, and Java Woman with excessive facial hair disorder
subject_terms_2: Photographs Portrait photography Thomson, J. (John), 1837-1921 Hypertrichosis Indigenous people
